"Schraft": "Good, seems like you're up to it! Alright, let me explain."
"Have you heard of the Ordinal Tower? It's one of the Advanced Trainia."
"Advanced Trainia are, quite literally, a more advanced form of Trainia."
"The exact nature of the training is different for each facility."
"And the Ordinal Tower stands alone amongst them."
"Not only does it include the usual Trainia environment, it also recreates environments from all across Halpha."
"And you'll have to work fast to make sure you finish on time."
"Put simply, your skills as an ARKS will be put to the test."
"Get your gear together and give it a try!"
